Html: I want to integrate Qr Code with ssrs Report, Does anyone of you done this earlier?
I, too, am interested in an SSRS implementation of this project. Has anyone tried this?

How do I add the control to the toolbox in Visual Studio 2008 for SSRS (BIDS).

I added the dll to: C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 9.0\Common7\IDE\PrivateAssemblies\QrCode.Net 0.4 Pre-Release\Gma.QrCodeNet.Encoding.Net35
I also added to: C:\Program Files\Microsoft SQL Server\MSRS10_50.MSSQLSERVER\Reporting Services\ReportServer\bin\QrCode.Net 0.4 Pre-Release\Gma.QrCodeNet.Encoding.Net35
Do it through in code rdl (SSRS) file generation in C# . NET then it is very simple
Can you give an example of the code (code used within SSRS is VB, not C#)

http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms153561.aspx

I have never done this. Here is link might resolve that reference issue.

Which Class Name must be called in SSRS Report?

Can you send any sample code?
